com.ac.games.data.parser

Class BGGGameParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ac.games.data.parser.BGGGameParser

  • public class BGGGameParser
extends Object
    This class should take the XML body output from the BGG API for a single game (examples are http://www.boardgamegeek.com/xmlapi/boardgame/?stats=1) and convert it into a BGGGame object.
    Author:
    ac010168

    • Method Detail

      • parseBGGXML

        public static BGGGame parseBGGXML(String xmlContent)
                           throws Throwable
        This is a static method used to help parse out BGGGame content from the BGG XML API request. This method should generate a complete object, or fail.
        Parameters:
        xmlContent - The XML string received from the GET request
        Returns:
        a BGGGame object fully parsed
        Throws:
        Throwable - Throws this error if there were any parsing issues or other problems

      • parseMultiBGGXML

        public static List<BGGGame> parseMultiBGGXML(String xmlContent)
                                      throws Throwable
        This method is designed to allow us to parse mutiple board game requests. These are results that are bound between {code} and {code}. This method should break the provided XML into the smaller sub-game blocks of XML and allow the regular parseBGGXML(String) method to process them as expected.
        Parameters:
        xmlContent - The full XML string involved.
        Returns:
        A List of BGGGame objects, or an empty list if none found.
        Throws:
        Throwable - Throws if something goes wrong during parsing.
